creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 3 poemas by Taira Michiyoshi, Jusentei Minato, Juho_
markings: A swastika mark(the poets circle mark) is sealed on the title cartouche.
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
text: The old man (tsure) with bloom stick and the old woman (mae shite) in picture are both sprits of pine trees. They represents the  love of old married couples.
title: Takasago Beach
